0:
[OUTPUT]
    Name http
    Match kube.*
    Host {{ .Release.Name }}-victoria-logs-single-server
    port 9428
    compress gzip
    uri /insert/jsonline?_stream_fields=stream,kubernetes_pod_name&_msg_field=log&_time_field=date
    format json_lines
    json_date_format iso8601
    header AccountID 0
    header ProjectID 0

[FILTER]
    Name kubernetes
    Match kube.*
    Merge_Log On
    Keep_Log On
    K8S-Logging.Parser On
    K8S-Logging.Exclude On
[FILTER]
    Name                nest
    Match               *
    Wildcard            pod_name
    Operation lift
    Nested_under kubernetes
    Add_prefix   kubernetes_

- job_name: node-exporter
  honor_labels: true
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  metrics_path: /metrics
  scheme: http
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "10.5.0.10:9100"

mqtt:
  host: mosquitto
cameras:
  front_door:
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
        - path: rtsp://admin:4118nick@192.168.99.119:554/cam/realmonitor?channel=1&subtype=1
          roles:
            - detect
        - path: rtsp://admin:4118nick@192.168.99.119:554/cam/realmonitor?channel=1&subtype=0
          roles:
            - record
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 5
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      required_zones:
        - porch
    record:
      enabled: True
      events:
        required_zones:
          - porch
    rtmp:
      enabled: false
    motion:
      mask:
        - 519,480,640,480,640,480,640,480,640,90,640,0,518,0,525,276
        - 0,255,0,165,640,158,640,254
        - 0,236,640,230,640,0,0,0
    zones:
      porch:
        coordinates: 0,480,517,480,525,264,0,229
        objects:
        - person
detectors:
  cpu1:
    type: cpu

record:
  # Optional: Enable recording (default: shown below)
  enabled: True
  # Optional: Number of days to retain recordings regardless of events (default: shown below)
  # NOTE: This should be set to 0 and retention should be defined in events section below
  #       if you only want to retain recordings of events.
  retain_days: 0
  # Optional: Event recording settings
  events:
    # Optional: Maximum length of time to retain video during long events. (default: shown below)
    # NOTE: If an object is being tracked for longer than this amount of time, the retained recordings
    #       will be the last x seconds of the event unless retain_days under record is > 0.
    #max_seconds: 300
    # Optional: Number of seconds before the event to include (default: shown below)
    pre_capture: 5
    # Optional: Number of seconds after the event to include (default: shown below)
    post_capture: 5
    # Optional: Objects to save recordings for. (default: all tracked objects)
    objects:
      - person
    # Optional: Restrict recordings to objects that entered any of the listed zones (default: no required zones)
    required_zones: []
    # Optional: Retention settings for recordings of events
    retain:
      # Required: Default retention days (default: shown below)
      default: 10
      # Optional: Per object retention days
      objects:
        person: 15

auth:
  - user: scans
    group: scans
    uid: 568
    gid: 568
    password: scans
global:
  - "force user = scans"
  - "force group = scans"
  - "create mask = 0644"
  - "directory mask = 0755"
share:
  - name: Scans
    path: /share1
    browsable: yes
    readonly: no
    guestok: no
    comment: "Printer scans"
    veto: yes
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 20
concurrent = 2

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 500
concurrent = 50

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 500
concurrent = 50

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"

---
modules:
  default:
    metrics:
    - name: mcc
      path: "{ .Aggregated_PerSecondStats.Samples }"
      help: Per-second stats aggregated over a minute
      labels:
        environment: test
